title: Classic Christmas Specials
description:
A DVD image that I made of my favorite Animated/Claymation Christmas Specials from when I was a kid. They have custom-made menus that I made especially for this. All you have to do is download and burn with your favorite program!

- A Charlie Brown Christmas
- Garfield's Christmas Special
- Rudolph The Red-Nosed Reindeer
- How The Grinch Stole Christmas
- The Year Without A Santa Claus
- Frosty The Snowman
- Santa Claus Is Coming To Town

All of the specials are DVDRips from various sources.

...

PLEASE SEED!!!
